text: "The Sound" is a 2016 song by British band The 1975 and was taken from their second studio album I Like It When You Sleep, for You Are So Beautiful yet So Unaware of It. It went to number 15 in the United Kingdom, number 11 in Scotland, number 53 in Australia, number 42 in Japan and number 25 in Ireland. ==References== Category:2016 songs Category:The 1975 songs
title: The Sound (The 1975 song)
